entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Port Elgin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:06 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 7.
